body: I run the IDF generated through EP-Launch, and it seems that all the default material definitions used for the default constructions are all missing ... May I ask how come the materials are not written into the IDF file using the **Run Energy Simulation** component? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I2UHAZfIP7YCWPA0oPzUJ4Z*g6eeV2NNuLrThXf4-FcKt59FYecqyHrpMnIVjZs0MZJX*9Cfyqo77o2tFmu0kmf5Afc17cac/Image3.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I2UHAZfIP7a1MKbihcDl4wgzydVNhCNtEZsEz1CgGck2s-wHZ1vm6IrUNszSiNeufn6gn3vOzCF7tkOaWXuxk3C4yP07aeq*/Image2.png) There is no such problem when using the **Export to OpenStudio** component to run the simulation: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I2UHAZfIP7Yfh*i2P4KEleDe83FT1PMIZWgPba7Xb3vsRdsVJ6osnKwNYcM49tD4554BoZEoZFA4w05p8-WhIMGCyJsaog0s/Image4.png)
